messages.title: SORRY – we missed you!
messages.content: Your local Plaid Cymru Team came to see you today because we know it is tough with any problems that you may be experiencing (rubbish, crime, housing etc) so please contact.

housing.content: Your local Plaid Cymru Team came to see you today because we know it is tough with any problems that you may be experiencing (rubbish, crime, housing etc) so please contact.

contactInformation.address: Published by Mohammed Sarul Islam, 2 Tewkesbury Street, Riverside, Cardiff, CF11 6ES.

images.caption: Photo of Mohammed Sarul Islam with the text 'SORRY – we missed you!' and 'ON YOUR SIDE!' in the background.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet makes a general outreach to the constituency on issues such as rubbish, crime, and housing, and encourages residents to get in touch with the local Plaid Cymru team, which includes Mohammed Sarul Islam.
